{"id":1824618124,"question_id":4115,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1762655563,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1824618124/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Distance Between Three Equal Elements I","memory":"28.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumDistance(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        if (N < 3) return -1;\n        \n        int ans = INT_MAX;\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            for (int j=i+1; j<N; j++) {\n                for (int k=j+1; k<N; k++) {\n                    if (nums[i] == nums[j] && nums[j] == nums[k])\n                        ans = min(ans, abs(i-j) + abs(j-k) + abs(k-i));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return (ans == INT_MAX) ? -1 : ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-distance-between-three-equal-elements-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1347}
